leadingComments.value:
*
 * eVN - Everyone's Visual Novel (Development build)
 * @see {@link https://github.com/bytesizedpacket/eVN}
 * @fileOverview eVN core script
 * @author Jacob Pedersen <jacob@bytesizedpacket.com> & Byte-Sized Packet <contact@bytesizedpacket.com>

 * @license {@link https://github.com/bytesizedpacket/eVN/blob/master/LICENSE | Attribution Assurance License (BSP edit)}
 * @version: 0.0.1a Pre-development version

trailingComments.value: * * Stylesheet used for adding fonts and full-screen styles. * You can insert your own style tag with the id `eVN-stylesheet` and it'll use that. * This lets you generate a nonce hash and apply it to achieve CSP compliance! * @see {@link http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/security/content-security-policy/#inline-code-considered-harmful}

leadingComments.value:
If a tag with the id `eVN-stylesheet` exists, we'll assume it's a <style> tag we can use for injecting rules
	   This lets end-developers insert their own <style> tag with a `nonce=` attribute if they need CSP compliance.

* * Stylesheet used for adding fonts and full-screen styles. * You can insert your own style tag with the id `eVN-stylesheet` and it'll use that. * This lets you generate a nonce hash and apply it to achieve CSP compliance! * @see {@link http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/security/content-security-policy/#inline-code-considered-harmful}

trailingComments.value: Execute our onPageLoad() function as soon as the browser has everything loaded

leadingComments.value: Execute our onPageLoad() function as soon as the browser has everything loaded

comments.value:
*
 * eVN - Everyone's Visual Novel (Development build)
 * @see {@link https://github.com/bytesizedpacket/eVN}
 * @fileOverview eVN core script
 * @author Jacob Pedersen <jacob@bytesizedpacket.com> & Byte-Sized Packet <contact@bytesizedpacket.com>
 * @copyright Byte-Sized Packet 2015
 * @license {@link https://github.com/bytesizedpacket/eVN/blob/master/LICENSE | Attribution Assurance License (BSP edit)}
 * @version: 0.0.1a Pre-development version

* * Stylesheet used for adding fonts and full-screen styles. * You can insert your own style tag with the id `eVN-stylesheet` and it'll use that. * This lets you generate a nonce hash and apply it to achieve CSP compliance! * @see {@link http://www.html5rocks.com/en/tutorials/security/content-security-policy/#inline-code-considered-harmful}

If a tag with the id `eVN-stylesheet` exists, we'll assume it's a <style> tag we can use for injecting rules
	   This lets end-developers insert their own <style> tag with a `nonce=` attribute if they need CSP compliance.
Execute our onPageLoad() function as soon as the browser has everything loaded
